title: Quality of life suggestions
body: Just a suggestion but with the introduction of the new Ranked Queue where you can select you preferred roles can there be a feature added that saves summoner spells for the role you have chosen i.e. junglers taking smite, supports taking exhaust, etc.

replies.body: Considering you are spending 5 mins in champ select anyway, I personally don't think this is necessary.

i've been in alot of game where people who get jungle forget smite because they didnt look at their sums and screw themselves over. btw not saying we need it just saying it would be nice to have thats all if someone sees this and puts it in then yay if not no biggy we will all live another day to fight on the rift.
